t -----Original Message----- From: Posted At: Sunday, October 15, 2006 8:09 PM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1376392F] FW: [ADMINS] [451152] VeriSign Secured Seal usage in your site (http://www.as-seen-on-tvshopping.com/) Subject: [EV1-C1376392F] FW: [ADMINS] [451152] VeriSign Secured Seal usage in your site (http://www.as-seen-on-tvshopping.com/) From: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: [EV1-C1376392F] FW: [ADMINS] [451152] VeriSign Secured Seal usage in your site (http://www.as-seen-on-tvshopping.com/) Reference: [EV1-C1376392F] For your review. -- Regards, Abuse Department The Planet - EV1Servers http://theplanet.com/legal/index.html http://ev1servers.net/About/aup.aspx http://ev1servers.net/About/tos.aspx http://www.ev1.net/english/about/aup.asp http://www.ev1.net/english/about/tos.asp ==== Original Message ==== 1. FW: [ADMINS] [451152] VeriSign Secured Seal usage in your site (http://www.as-seen-on-tvshopping.com/) Added by system at Sunday, Oct 15 2006 06:08 pm X-MailFrom: rcarter@theplanet.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [172.16.220.211] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Sun Oct 15 19:07:19 2006 Received: from DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL ([172.16.220.10]) by MAILCORE.THEPLANET.COM with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Sun, 15 Oct 2006 19:04:44 -0500 Received: from 216.160.0.193 ([216.160.0.193]) by dald2exch01.PLANET.LOCAL ([172.16.220.10]) via Exchange Front-End Server owa.theplanet.com ([70.87.6.111]) with Microsoft Exchange Server HTTP-DAV ; Mon, 16 Oct 2006 00:04:44 +0000 MIME-Version: 1.0 Subject: FW: [ADMINS] [451152] VeriSign Secured Seal usage in your site (http://www.as-seen-on-tvshopping.com/) From: Ryan Carter To: "abuse@theplanet.com" Thread-Topic: [ADMINS] [451152] VeriSign Secured Seal usage in your site (http://www.as-seen-on-tvshopping.com/) Thread-Index: AcbwtrgzYCeqyLfbQGyWfi2y6xRHLA== Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="_A6E7295B-6476-4492-B0EB-B7AFE532CF47_" Message-ID: X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Web Access 6.5.7638.1 X-MimeCtl: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5.7638.1 Date: Sun, 15 Oct 2006 19:04:59 -0500 Return-Path: rcarter@theplanet.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 16 Oct 2006 00:04:44.0803 (UTC) FILETIME=[AFA2BD30:01C6F0B6] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) From: brandabuse@verisign.com Sent: Fri 10/13/2006 3:44 PM To: nic@powersurge.net Cc: admins@theplanet.com Subject: [ADMINS] [451152] VeriSign Secured Seal usage in your site (http://www.as-seen-on-tvshopping.com/) To Whom It May Concern: As a part of our VeriSign SecuredT Seal Program, we are confirming if you have a valid VeriSign SSL Certificate for http://www.as-seen-on-tvshopping.com/. Only domains that are protected with valid, full service VeriSign SSL Certificates are eligible to display the VeriSign SecuredT Seal. Please reply with a confirmation that this Web site has the rights to display the VeriSign SecuredT Seal. In the event we have made a mistake in contacting you, we sincerely apologize for this inconvenience. Additionally, if you are not the correct person to handle this request, we ask that you forward it to the appropriate contact. If you do not have the appropriate rights to display the VeriSign SecuredT Seal, please remove it immediately and visit your local VeriSign Web site, or contact a local VeriSign representative, in order to purchase a valid VeriSign SSL Certificate. For the US, please visit http://www.verisign.com/ssl/buy-ssl-certificates/index.html. For all other regions, please visit: http://www.verisign.com/verisign-worldwide/index.html. Thank you for your time and consideration. Hanh VeriSign Fraud Detection Team brandabuse@verisign.com 1-866-880-7025 (US) / 1-650-426-7025 (International) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ------ Electronic Privacy Notice. This e-mail, and any attachments, contains information that is, or may be, covered by the Electronic Communications Privacy Act, 18 U.S.C. 2510-2521, and is also confidential and proprietary in nature. If you are not the intended recipient, please be advised that you are legally prohibited from retaining, using, copying, distributing, or otherwise disclosing this information in any manner. Instead, please reply to the sender that you have received this communication in error, and then immediately delete it. Thank you in advance for your cooperation. ======================================================================== ====== MIME element (text/html)
 

From: brandabuse@verisign.com
Sent: Fri 10/13/2006 3:44 PM
To: nic@powersurge.net
Cc: admins@theplanet.com
Subject: [ADMINS] [451152] VeriSign Secured Seal usage in your site (http://www.as-seen-on-tvshopping.com/)

To Whom It May Concern:

in contacting you, we sincerely apologize for this inconvenience.

we ask that you forward it to the appropriate contact.

http://www.verisign.com/verisign-worldwide/index.html. 
 
Thank you for your time and consideration. 
 
Hanh
